au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.core
Class NormalisedObjectViewFactory

java.lang.Object
  au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.core.NormalisedObjectViewFactory

public class NormalisedObjectViewFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This is a factory class to produce a JPanel that contains the view of a normalised xena object. The JPanel will contain the component that represents the view. For example:

  • For XML tree view, return a JTree component.
  • For plaintext, return a text field
  • For image, return a canvas.
  • For NAA Package view, return a split pane, the bottom one contains meta information, the top is the view that has been wrapped (image, plaintext etc).
The factory should reference a XenaObject, so that it can get a view manager, and can focus on creating the jpanel and not worrying about anything else (like loading plugins etc)

Version:
0.1

getView

public XenaView getView(java.io.File xenaFile)

This returns the default XenaView for a given Xena file.

Parameters:
xenaFile - Xena file to display
Returns:
XenaView (JPanel) containing the display of the normalised file
Throws:
XenaException

getView

public XenaView getView(java.io.File xenaFile,
                        XenaView viewType)
                 throws XenaException
This returns a XenaView. If the given viewType is null, then the default view type for the given xena file will be retrieved and used.

Parameters:
xenaFile - Xena file to display
viewType - represents a template for the type of view to display
Returns:
XenaView (JPanel) containing the display of the normalised file
Throws:
XenaException - - in the event of one of the following errors occuring:
  • Unable to create XenaInpoutSource from the specified file
  • Unable to retrieve appropriate XenaView for this file
  • XenaView unable to render the file correctly

getAvailableViews

public java.util.List<XenaView> getAvailableViews()
This method returns all the available views that are available to display a Xena object.

Returns:
List containing loads xena view instances.
